query.statement:
SELECT '' CHK, '' FLAG, MS002.MANDT AS MANDT -- 클라이언트번호 ,MS002.POSID AS POSID -- Project ,MS001.ZSITE_NM AS ZSITE_NM -- Project 명 ,MS002.POSID_1 AS POSID_1 -- 호기 ,'8980' AS ART -- 검사유형 ,MS002.ZSPEC1 AS ZSPEC1 -- 기종 ,MS002.ZSPEC2 AS ZSPEC2 -- SPEC(사양) ,'01' AS SEQ -- 차수(입력시 자동 증가) ,'0' AS GUBUN -- 검사신청 ,MS002.ZZGUBUN AS ZZGUBUN -- 구분 ,'' AS PARQDT -- 검사요청일 ,CS101_IJY AS IJY -- 입주예정일 ,MS002.ZBOSUIN AS ZBOSUIN -- 인수일 ,MS002.ZZJUNGD AS ZZJUNGD -- 준공일 ,MS002.ZQEGEMSA AS ZQEGEMSA -- QC검사일 ,MS002.PAPRID AS PAPRID -- QC 검사자 사번 ,VALUE(( SELECT TRIM(IRUM) FROM SAPHEE.ZHRT001 AS HR001 WHERE HR001.MANDT=MS002.MANDT AND HR001.PSNO =MS002.PAPRID ), MS002.PAPRID) AS PARTID_NM ,MS002.ZBEPJEO AS ZBEPJEO -- 법정검사일자 ,VALUE(( SELECT DISTINCT MM028.CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0201 AS PS024 ,SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS MM028 WHERE PS024.MANDT = MM028.MANDT AND PS024.CODE2 = MM028.CODE2 AND PS024.MANDT = MS002.MANDT AND PS024.PSPID = MS002.POSID AND PS024.POSID = MS002.POSID_1 AND PS024.CHK_KIND = 'A' AND PS024.CHASU = '001' AND MM028.CODE1 = 'PS004' AND MM028.LANG = #G_LANG# ), '') AS ZBEPJEO_NM ,MS002.LIFNR AS LIFNR -- 설치업체 ,SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(MS002.MANDT,MS002.LIFNR) AS LIFNR_NM -- 설치업체명 ,MS002.TEMNO2 AS TEMNO -- 설치PM ,MS002.NAMET AS NAMET -- 설치PM명 ,MS002.ZZBSU AS ZZBSU -- 보수업체 ,SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(MS002.MANDT,MS002.ZZBSU) AS ZZBSU_NM -- 보수업체명 ,MS002.ZZBPM AS ZZBPM -- 보수PM ,VALUE(( SELECT TRIM(IRUM) FROM SAPHEE.ZHRT001 AS HR001 WHERE HR001.MANDT=MS002.MANDT AND HR001.PSNO ='H' || MS002.ZZBPM ), MS002.PAPRID) AS ZZBPM_NM ,CASE WHEN INT(MS002.ZMUSAUCNT) > 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS ZMUSAUCNT -- 공사용 사용 개월수 ,'88' AS ZZACTSS -- 설치대지역 ,TRIM(MS001.ADDR1) || ' ' || TRIM(MS001.ADDR2) AS ADDR -- 현장주소 ,TRIM(MS001.ADDR1) AS ADDR1 -- 현장명 ,MS001.ZCITY AS ZCITY -- 설치지역 ,MS001.ZCITY_NM AS ZCITY_NM -- 설치지역명 ,MS002.POSID_OLD , QM019.INTE_LFNR , QM019.INTE_LFNM , QM019.INTE_NAME , QM019.INTE_CELL , '1.0' AS DAESU FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS MS002 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT019 AS QM019 ON QM019.MANDT = MS002.MANDT AND QM019.WERKS = '1000' AND QM019.HOGI = MS002.POSID_1 AND QM019.ART = '8980' AND QM019.DSCODE IN ('A','B','C','D','H','E',' ','')
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST101 AS CS101 ON MS002.MANDT = CS101.MANDT AND MS002.POSID = CS101.CS101_PJT AND SUBSTR(MS002.POSID_1,7) = CS101.CS101_HNO
,SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MS001
WHERE MS002.MANDT = MS001.MANDT AND MS002.POSID = MS001.POSID AND MS002.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
-- AND MS002.ZOIPSU = '00000000' -- 입주일자가 없는것
-- AND MS001.ZQNTY > '01' -- 관리대수가 1대 이상 -- AND MS001.ZQNTY > 1 -- 관리대수가 1대 이상
AND QM019.MANDT IS NULL -- 신청 진행중인것은 제외 AND MS002.POSID LIKE #POSID#||'%' -- 프로젝트번호
--AND MS001.ZZARA = #ARA# -- 보수대지역
--AND MS002.ZZBPM = #BPM# -- 보수PM
--AND MS002.ZZBSU = #BSU# -- 보수협력사
ORDER BY MS002.POSID_1 FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
